dataObject.content: Hundreds of white nationalists lined the streets of Charlottesville, Va., last Saturday to protest the removal of a Confederate monument. Some waved Confederate and Nazi flags, others brandished shields.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Biased. Putting everyone their into the bubble of white nationalist is an assumption. An ordinary person could be involved in protesting the removal of a historical monument based on merit alone."}
{"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"No emotion is related there or some stretching of the reality. It's all facts. Unbiased"}
